text: Pet peeve: I send someone an email asking a question. I say specifically, up front, in the subject of the message: "No rush, when you have time..." And at the beginning of the reply I get an explanation of why they won't be able to do it for a week, including what park they're going to and who's going with them. I think when you specifically say no rush, any time will do, that removes the need to explain.
